class.name: TabletopImporter
class.description: Import resources from the filesystem at runtime. When an instance is created, certain resource importers are instanced and registered if they were not done so already by the engine.

method.name: import
method.description: Import the file at [code]path[/code]. The result is written to [code]import_path[/code] with an extention automatically appended. Import parameters can be provided in [code]options[/code], which will override the parameters in the [code].import[/code] file if it exists.
